raw: * This class is responsible for checking the scrolling behavior of the client.
* This class is used by {@link qx.core.Environment} and should not be used
* directly. Please check its class comment for details how to use it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This class is responsible for checking the scrolling behavior of the client. This class is used by {@link qx.core.Environment} and should not be used directly. Please check its class comment for details how to use it.

raw: * Check if the scrollbars should be positioned on top of the content. This
* is true of OSX Lion when the scrollbars disappear automatically.
*   positioned on top of the content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Check if the scrollbars should be positioned on top of the content. This is true of OSX Lion when the scrollbars disappear automatically.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the scrollbars should be positioned on top of the content.
@return.description: true if the scrollbars should be positioned on top of the content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks if native scroll can be used for the current mobile device.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the current device is capable to use native scroll.
@return.description: true if the current device is capable to use native scroll.
